They did a funny thing with the Mexican dub. They kept the American names, while transmitting the original version, even Sailor Stars, they even managed to skip Haruka and Michiru's relationship by just hinting and playing it vague.

So good luck getting the full release US. We already did it 20 years ago trololololol

topics.body: Before someone asks it's a direct redub of the franchise.  What I mean by that is no censorship of Uranus being gay with Neptune(Yes I intentionally made this joke), no terrible editing that looks terrible and so forth; just a completely 100% true to the japanese version dubbing.

topics.body:
I bet $5000 soccer moms are going to throw a shit fit when they find out how many glbt characters there are in sailor moon and that for years they had their kids watching it.

I can imagine it now some soccer mom buys one of the new dubs for their kids, pops it into the dvd player and hilarity ensues.
